```
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal storage at position (5.5, -57.5)
Consists of a chest at position (5.5, -57.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Not enough resources in inventory
- Ensure enough resources are in the inventory before attempting to craft or place items. The agent tried to craft when it did not have enough iron ore and wooden chests.

### Errors when moving to a position
- The agent received a `string indices must be integers, not 'str'` error when attempting to move to a wood position. This indicates an error in how the position is being handled, likely passing a string instead of numerical coordinates. Ensure that the coordinates used for movement are numerical values.

### Errors when harvesting due to being out of reach or inventory full
- The agent attempted to harvest wood but was either out of reach or there was nothing to harvest. Ensure the agent is within reach of the target resource before attempting to harvest.
- The agent attempted to harvest iron ore but the inventory was full. Ensure the agent has enough space in its inventory before attempting to harvest.

## NAMESPACE

### Variables:
- inventory: Dict[str, int]
```
